item.title: User: All Configuration Settings
item.description:
Admin > Configuration > My Store

Store Name

Key: STORE_NAME
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: The name of my store

Store Owner

Key: STORE_OWNER
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: The name of my store owner

Telephone - Customer Service

Key: STORE_TELEPHONE_CUSTSERVICE
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Enter a telephone number for customers to reach your Customer Service department. This number may be sent as part of payment transaction details.

Country

Key: STORE_COUNTRY
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: The country my store is located in

Note: Please remember to update the store zone.

Zone

Key: STORE_ZONE
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: The zone my store is located in

Store Address and Phone

Key: STORE_NAME_ADDRESS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: This is the Store Name, Address and Phone used on printable documents and displayed online

Expected Sort Order

Key: EXPECTED_PRODUCTS_SORT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: This is the sort order used in the expected products box.

Expected Sort Field

Key: EXPECTED_PRODUCTS_FIELD
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: The column to sort by in the expected products box.

Switch To Default Language Currency

Key: USE_DEFAULT_LANGUAGE_CURRENCY
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Automatically switch to the language's currency when it is changed

Language Selector

Key: LANGUAGE_DEFAULT_SELECTOR
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Should the default language be based on the Store preferences, or the customer's browser settings?

Default: Store's default settings

Display Cart After Adding Product

Key: DISPLAY_CART
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Display the shopping cart after adding a product (or return back to their origin)

Default Search Operator

Key: ADVANCED_SEARCH_DEFAULT_OPERATOR
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Default search operators

Include meta-tags in product search?

Key: ADVANCED_SEARCH_INCLUDE_METATAGS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Should a product's meta-tag keywords and meta-tag descriptions be considered in any advanced_search_results displayed?

Show Category Counts

Key: SHOW_COUNTS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Count recursively how many products are in each category

Show Category Counts - Admin

Key: SHOW_COUNTS_ADMIN
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Show Category Counts in Admin?

Show linked status for categories

Key: SHOW_CATEGORY_PRODUCTS_LINKED_STATUS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Show Category products linked status?

Tax Decimal Places

Key: TAX_DECIMAL_PLACES
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Pad the tax value this amount of decimal places

Display Prices with Tax

Key: DISPLAY_PRICE_WITH_TAX
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Display prices with tax included (true) or add the tax at the end (false)

Display Prices with Tax in Admin

Key: DISPLAY_PRICE_WITH_TAX_ADMIN
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Display prices with tax included (true) or add the tax at the end (false) in Admin(Invoices)

Basis of Product Tax

Key: STORE_PRODUCT_TAX_BASIS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: On what basis is Product Tax calculated. Options are
Shipping - Based on customers Shipping Address
Billing Based on customers Billing address
Store - Based on Store address if Billing/Shipping Zone equals Store zone

Basis of Shipping Tax

Key: STORE_SHIPPING_TAX_BASIS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: On what basis is Shipping Tax calculated. Options are
Shipping - Based on customers Shipping Address
Billing Based on customers Billing address
Store - Based on Store address if Billing/Shipping Zone equals Store zone - Can be overridden by correctly written Shipping Module

Sales Tax Display Status

Key: STORE_TAX_DISPLAY_STATUS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Always show Sales Tax even when amount is $0.00?
0= Off
1= On

Show Split Tax Lines

Key: SHOW_SPLIT_TAX_CHECKOUT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: If multiple tax rates apply, show each rate as a separate line at checkout

Store Status

Key: STORE_STATUS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: What is your Store Status
0= Normal Store
1= Showcase no prices
2= Showcase with prices

PA-DSS Admin Session Timeout Enforced?

Key: PADSS_ADMIN_SESSION_TIMEOUT_ENFORCED
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: PA-DSS Compliance requires that any Admin login sessions expire after 15 minutes of inactivity. Disabling this makes your site NON-COMPLIANT with PA-DSS rules, thus invalidating any certification.

PA-DSS Strong Password Rules Enforced?

Key: PADSS_PWD_EXPIRY_ENFORCED
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: PA-DSS Compliance requires that admin passwords must be changed after 90 days and cannot re-use the last 4 passwords. Disabling this makes your site NON-COMPLIANT with PA-DSS rules, thus invalidating any certification.

PA-DSS Ajax Checkout?

Key: PADSS_AJAX_CHECKOUT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: PA-DSS Compliance requires that for some inbuilt payment methods, that we use ajax to draw the checkout confirmation screen. While this will only happen if one of those payment methods is actually present, some people may want the traditional checkout flow Disabling this makes your site NON-COMPLIANT with PA-DSS rules, thus invalidating any certification.

Admin Session Time Out in Seconds

Key: SESSION_TIMEOUT_ADMIN
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Enter the time in seconds.
Max allowed is 900 for PCI Compliance Reasons.
Default=900
Example: 900= 15 min

Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products

Admin Set max_execution_time for processes

Key: GLOBAL_SET_TIME_LIMIT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Enter the time in seconds for how long the max_execution_time of processes should be. Default=60
Example: 60= 1 minute

Note: Changing the time limit is only needed if you are having problems with the execution time of a process

Show if version update available

Key: SHOW_VERSION_UPDATE_IN_HEADER
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Automatically check to see if a new version of Zen Cart is available. Enabling this can sometimes slow down the loading of Admin pages. (Displayed on main Index page after login, and Server Info page.)

Server Uptime

Key: DISPLAY_SERVER_UPTIME
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Displaying Server uptime can cause entries in error logs on some servers. (true = Display, false = don't display)

Missing Page Check

Key: MISSING_PAGE_CHECK
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Zen Cart can check for missing pages in the URL and redirect to Index page. For debugging you may want to turn this off.

Default=On
On = Send missing pages to 'index'
Off = Don't check for missing pages
Page Not Found = display the Page-Not-Found page

Currency Conversion Ratio

Key: CURRENCY_UPLIFT_RATIO
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: When auto-updating currencies, what "uplift" ratio should be used to calculate the exchange rate used by your store?
ie: the bank rate is obtained from the currency-exchange servers; how much extra do you want to charge in order to make up the difference between the bank rate and the consumer rate?

Default: 1.05
This will cause the published bank rate to be multiplied by 1.05 to set the currency rates in your store.

Currency Exchange Rate: Primary Source

Key: CURRENCY_SERVER_PRIMARY
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Where to request external currency updates from (Primary source)

Additional sources can be installed via plugins.

Currency Exchange Rate: Secondary Source

Key: CURRENCY_SERVER_BACKUP
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Where to request external currency updates from (Secondary source)

Additional sources can be installed via plugins.

HTML Editor

Key: HTML_EDITOR_PREFERENCE
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Please select the HTML/Rich-Text editor you wish to use for composing Admin-related emails, newsletters, and product descriptions

Default for Notify Customer on Order Status Update?

Key: NOTIFY_CUSTOMER_DEFAULT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Set the default email behavior on status update to Send Email, Do Not Send Email, or Hide Update.

Customer Place Order: Single Admin ID

Key: EMP_LOGIN_ADMIN_ID
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Identify the ID number of an admin that is permitted to use the Place Order feature on the customers list, regardless of their assigned admin-profile. Set the value to 0 to disable the Single Admin ID feature.

Customer Place Order: Admin Profiles

Key: EMP_LOGIN_ADMIN_PROFILE_ID
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Identify the admin User Profile IDs that are permitted to use the Place Order feature on the customers list — all admins that are in these profiles are permitted. Enter the value as a comma-separated list (intervening blanks are OK) of Admin Profile IDs, e.g. 1, 2, 3. Set the value to 0 to disable the Admin Profiles feature.

Default: 0

Customer Place Order: Passwordless Login

Key: EMP_LOGIN_AUTOMATIC
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Login directly to store without entering credentials

Password

Credit Card Number

Credit Card CVV Number

Product Review Text

Best Sellers

Also Purchased Products

Path: Configuration > Minimum Values
Description: Minimum number of products to display in the 'Also Purchased' box

Admin Usernames

Key: ADMIN_NAME_MINIMUM_LENGTH
Path: Configuration > Minimum Values
Description: Minimum length of admin usernames (must be 4 or more)

Admin > Configuration > Maximum Values

Address Book Entries

Key: MAX_ADDRESS_BOOK_ENTRIES
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Maximum address book entries a customer is allowed to have

Admin Search Results Per Page

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_SEARCH_RESULTS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of products to list on an Admin search result page

Prev/Next Navigation Page Links (Desktop)

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_PAGE_LINKS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of numbered pagination links to display.

Prev/Next Navigation Page Links (Mobile)

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_PAGE_LINKS_MOBILE
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of numbered pagination links to display on Mobile devices (assuming your template supports mobile-specific settings)

Products on Special

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_SPECIAL_PRODUCTS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of products on special to display

New Products Module

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_PRODUCTS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of new products to display in a category

Upcoming Products

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_UPCOMING_PRODUCTS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of 'upcoming' products to display

Manufacturers List - Scroll Box Size/Style

Key: MAX_MANUFACTURERS_LIST
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of manufacturers names to be displayed in the scroll box window. Setting this to 1 or 0 will display a dropdown list.

Manufacturers List - Verify Product Exist

Key: PRODUCTS_MANUFACTURERS_STATUS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Verify that at least 1 product exists and is active for the manufacturer name to show

Note: When this feature is ON it can produce slower results on sites with a large number of products and/or manufacturers
0= off 1= on

Music Genre List - Scroll Box Size/Style

Key: MAX_MUSIC_GENRES_LIST
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of music genre names to be displayed in the scroll box window. Setting this to 1 or 0 will display a dropdown list.

Record Company List - Scroll Box Size/Style

Key: MAX_RECORD_COMPANY_LIST
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of record company names to be displayed in the scroll box window. Setting this to 1 or 0 will display a dropdown list.

Length of Record Company Name

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_RECORD_COMPANY_NAME_LEN
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Used in record companies box; maximum length of record company name to display. Longer names will be truncated.

Length of Music Genre Name

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_MUSIC_GENRES_NAME_LEN
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Used in music genres box; maximum length of music genre name to display. Longer names will be truncated.

Length of Manufacturers Name

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_MANUFACTURER_NAME_LEN
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Used in manufacturers box; maximum length of manufacturers name to display. Longer names will be truncated.

New Product Reviews Per Page

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_NEW_REVIEWS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of new reviews to display on each page

Random Product Reviews for SideBox

Key: MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_REVIEWS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of random product REVIEWS to rotate in the sidebox
Enter the number of products to display in this sidebox at one time.

How many products do you want to display in this sidebox?

Random New Products for SideBox

Key: MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_NEW
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of random NEW products to rotate in the sidebox
Enter the number of products to display in this sidebox at one time.

How many products do you want to display in this sidebox?

Random Products On Special for SideBox

Key: MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_SPECIALS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of random products on SPECIAL to rotate in the sidebox
Enter the number of products to display in this sidebox at one time.

How many products do you want to display in this sidebox?

Categories To List Per Row

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_CATEGORIES_PER_ROW
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: How many categories to list per row

New Products Listing- Number Per Page

Path: Configuration > Maximum Values

Best Sellers For Box

Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of best sellers to display in box

Also Purchased Products

Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of products to display in the 'Also Purchased' box

Order History Box

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_PRODUCTS_IN_ORDER_HISTORY_BOX
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of products to display in the order history box

Customer Order History List Per Page

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_ORDER_HISTORY
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Number of orders to display in the order history list in 'My Account'

Maximum Display of Customers on Customers Page

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_SEARCH_RESULTS_CUSTOMER
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Default value: 20

Maximum Display of Orders on Orders Page

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_SEARCH_RESULTS_ORDERS
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values
Description: Default value: 20

Maximum Display of Products on Reports

Maximum Categories Products Display List

Products Listing- Number Per Page

Random Featured Products for SideBox

Key: MAX_RANDOM_SELECT_FEATURED_PRODUCTS

Enter the number of products to display in this sidebox at one time.

How many products do you want to display in this sidebox?

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_SPECIAL_PRODUCTS_INDEX
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values

New Product Listing - Limited to ...

Key: SHOW_NEW_PRODUCTS_LIMIT
Path: Configuration > Maximum Values

0= All Products
1= Current Month
7= 7 Days
14= 14 Days

60= 60 Days
90= 90 Days

Maximum Display of Products All Page

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_PRODUCTS_ALL

Key: MAX_LANGUAGE_FLAGS_COLUMNS

Maximum File Upload Size

3 = Default

Maximum Display EZ-Pages

Key: MAX_DISPLAY_SEARCH_RESULTS_EZPAGE

20 = Default

Configuration > Customer Details

Email Salutation

Key: ACCOUNT_GENDER
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Display salutation choice during account creation and with account information

Date of Birth

Key: ACCOUNT_DOB

Description: Display date of birth field during account creation and with account information
NOTE: Set Minimum Value Date of Birth to blank for not required
Set Minimum Value Date of Birth > 0 to require

Company

Key: ACCOUNT_COMPANY
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Display company field during account creation and with account information

Address Line 2

Key: ACCOUNT_SUBURB
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Display address line 2 field during account creation and with account information

State

Key: ACCOUNT_STATE
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Display state field during account creation and with account information

State - Always display as pulldown?

Key: ACCOUNT_STATE_DRAW_INITIAL_DROPDOWN
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: When state field is displayed, should it always be a pulldown menu?

Create Account Default Country ID

Key: SHOW_CREATE_ACCOUNT_DEFAULT_COUNTRY
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Set Create Account Default Country ID to:
Default is 223

Fax Number

Key: ACCOUNT_FAX_NUMBER
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Display fax number field during account creation and with account information

Show Newsletter Checkbox

Key: ACCOUNT_NEWSLETTER_STATUS
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Show Newsletter Checkbox
0= off
1= Display Unchecked
2= Display Checked
Note: Defaulting this to accepted may be in violation of certain regulations for your state or country

Customer Default Email Preference

Key: ACCOUNT_EMAIL_PREFERENCE
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Set the Default Customer Default Email Preference
0= Text
1= HTML

Customer Product Notification Status

Key: CUSTOMERS_PRODUCTS_NOTIFICATION_STATUS
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Customer should be asked about product notifications after checkout success and in account preferences
0= Never ask
1= Ask (ignored on checkout if has already selected global notifications)

Note: Sidebox must be turned off separately

Customer Shop Status - View Shop and Prices

Key: CUSTOMERS_APPROVAL
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Customer must be approved to shop
0= Not required
1= Must login to browse
2= May browse but no prices unless logged in
3= Showroom Only

It is recommended that Option 2 be used for the purposes of Spiders if you wish customers to login to see prices.

Customer Approval Status - Authorization Pending

Key: CUSTOMERS_APPROVAL_AUTHORIZATION
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Customer must be Authorized to shop
0= Not required
1= Must be Authorized to Browse
2= May browse but no prices unless Authorized
3= Customer May Browse and May see Prices but Must be Authorized to Buy

It is recommended that Option 2 or 3 be used for the purposes of Spiders

Customer Authorization: filename

Key: CUSTOMERS_AUTHORIZATION_FILENAME
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Customer Authorization filename
Note: Do not include the extension
Default=customers_authorization

Customer Authorization: Hide Header

Key: CUSTOMERS_AUTHORIZATION_HEADER_OFF
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Customer Authorization: Hide Header
(true=hide false=show)

Customer Authorization: Hide Column Left

Key: CUSTOMERS_AUTHORIZATION_COLUMN_LEFT_OFF
Path: Configuration > Customer Details
Description: Customer Authorization: Hide Column Left
(true=hide false=show)

Path: Configuration > My Store

Shipping - Based on customers Shipping Address
Billing Based on customers Billing address
Store - Based on Store address if Billing/Shipping Zone equals Store zone

Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: On what basis is Shipping Tax calculated. Options are
Shipping - Based on customers Shipping Address

Store - Based on Store address if Billing/Shipping Zone equals Store zone - Can be overridden by correctly written Shipping Module

1= On

Store Status

Key: STORE_STATUS
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: What is your Store Status
0= Normal Store
1= Showcase no prices
2= Showcase with prices

PA-DSS Admin Session Timeout Enforced?

Key: PADSS_ADMIN_SESSION_TIMEOUT_ENFORCED
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: PA-DSS Compliance requires that any Admin login sessions expire after 15 minutes of inactivity. Disabling this makes your site NON-COMPLIANT with PA-DSS rules, thus invalidating any certification.

PA-DSS Strong Password Rules Enforced?

Key: PADSS_PWD_EXPIRY_ENFORCED
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: PA-DSS Compliance requires that admin passwords must be changed after 90 days and cannot re-use the last 4 passwords. Disabling this makes your site NON-COMPLIANT with PA-DSS rules, thus invalidating any certification.

PA-DSS Ajax Checkout?

Key: PADSS_AJAX_CHECKOUT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: PA-DSS Compliance requires that for some inbuilt payment methods, that we use ajax to draw the checkout confirmation screen. While this will only happen if one of those payment methods is actually present, some people may want the traditional checkout flow Disabling this makes your site NON-COMPLIANT with PA-DSS rules, thus invalidating any certification.

Admin Session Time Out in Seconds

Key: SESSION_TIMEOUT_ADMIN
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Enter the time in seconds.
Max allowed is 900 for PCI Compliance Reasons.
Default=900
Example: 900= 15 min

Note: Too few seconds can result in timeout issues when adding/editing products

Admin Set max_execution_time for processes

Key: GLOBAL_SET_TIME_LIMIT
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Enter the time in seconds for how long the max_execution_time of processes should be. Default=60
Example: 60= 1 minute

Note: Changing the time limit is only needed if you are having problems with the execution time of a process

Key: SHOW_VERSION_UPDATE_IN_HEADER
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Automatically check to see if a new version of Zen Cart is available. Enabling this can sometimes slow down the loading of Admin pages. (Displayed on main Index page after login, and Server Info page.)

Server Uptime

Key: DISPLAY_SERVER_UPTIME
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Displaying Server uptime can cause entries in error logs on some servers. (true = Display, false = don't display)

Missing Page Check

Key: MISSING_PAGE_CHECK
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Zen Cart can check for missing pages in the URL and redirect to Index page. For debugging you may want to turn this off.

Default=On
On = Send missing pages to 'index'
Off = Don't check for missing pages
Page Not Found = display the Page-Not-Found page

Currency Conversion Ratio

Key: CURRENCY_UPLIFT_RATIO
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: When auto-updating currencies, what "uplift" ratio should be used to calculate the exchange rate used by your store?
ie: the bank rate is obtained from the currency-exchange servers; how much extra do you want to charge in order to make up the difference between the bank rate and the consumer rate?

Default: 1.05
This will cause the published bank rate to be multiplied by 1.05 to set the currency rates in your store.

Currency Exchange Rate: Primary Source

Key: CURRENCY_SERVER_PRIMARY
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Where to request external currency updates from (Primary source)

Additional sources can be installed via plugins.

Currency Exchange Rate: Secondary Source

Key: CURRENCY_SERVER_BACKUP
Path: Configuration > My Store
Description: Where to request external currency updates from (Secondary source)

Additional sources can be installed via plugins.

See also Email for more information on customizing your store’s email.

E-Mail Transport Method

Key: EMAIL_TRANSPORT
Path: Configuration > E-Mail Options
Description: Defines the method for sending mail.

PHP is the default, and uses built-in PHP wrappers for processing.
smtpauth should be used by most sites, as it provides secure sending of authenticated email. You must also configure your smtpauth settings in the appropriate fields in this admin section.
Gmail is used for sending emails using the Google mail service, and requires the [less secure] setting enabled in your gmail account.
sendmail is for linux/unix hosts using the sendmail program on the server
sendmail-f is only for servers which require the use of the -f parameter to use sendmail. This is a security setting often used to prevent spoofing. Will cause errors if your host mailserver is not configured to use it.
Qmail is used for linux/unix hosts running Qmail as sendmail wrapper at /var/qmail/bin/sendmail.

MOST SITES WILL USE [smtpauth].
